channel.title: That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: Playwright Example >> TextBox
item.description:
In this article, we will use Playwright (Python version) to fill textbox in the web form. And get the text value of text box.

  • Fill the Textbox
  • Get the value of Textbox
  • Conclusion

item.title: Create an Interactive Web App for Data Science in 10 Minutes With Streamlit
item.description:
In this article, we will use streamlit library to create a interactive web app of training a machine learning model for breast cancer dataset.

  • What is Streamlit
  • Basic usage of Streamlit
  • Create a demo app
  • Conclusion

item.title: How to Create Python Virtual Environment
item.description:
In this article, we will introduce how to create a python virtual environment.

  • What is virtual environment
  • Install Pipenv
  • Create a virtual environment with Pipenv
  • Install required libraries and run app
  • Other commands
  • Conclusion

item.title: Pandas >> Reshaping Data and Analyze Data
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to reshaping data and analyze data using pivot, pivot_table, Stack, Unstack, Melt methods.

  • Reshape data using pivot()
  • Pivot and aggregate data using pivot_table()
  • Reshape data using stack() and unstack()
  • Reshape data using melt()
  • Conclusion

item.title: Playwright >> Save authentication state and Login atuomatically
item.description:
In the previous article, we introduced the basic usage of Playwright. In this article, we will talk about some advanced usage like auto-login and save authentication states like cookies or tokens.

  • Recording login steps
  • Save authentication state
  • Reuse authentication state to log in automatically

item.title: How to Extract Items of Invoice Using Form Recognizer API
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to use Azure Form Recognizer API to extract items from an invoice.

  • Download sample code from Form Recognizer Studio
  • Setup endpoint and key for calling API
  • Install necessary library
  • Execute sample code
  • Extract items from local sample invoice
  • Conclusion

item.title: How to Extract Items From Invoices Using Azure Form Recognizer
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to extract items from an invoice.

  • Create a free Azure account
  • Create a Free Trial subscription
  • Create congnitive service resource
  • Extract items from sample invoice
  • Conclusion

item.title: How to Create a Static Website With Basic Authentication on Azure Only Using Browser in 10 Minutes
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to build a static website on Azure, when accessed the user name and password are needed because the basic authentication module is added.

  • Create a free Azure account
  • Create and deploy the sample static HTML website to Azure
  • Update Home Page (index.html)
  • Add authentication module and set username and password
  • Conclusion
  • References

item.title: How to Use Form Recognizer to Extract Items From Receipt
item.description:
In this article, Let’s use Azure Form Recognizer, latest AI-OCR tool developed by Microsoft to extract items from receipt.

  • Setup Azure (Microsoft Cloud Computing Services) account
  • Setup Form Recognizer Studio setting
  • Use prebuild model to extract items from receipt downloaded from Intenet

item.title: How to Split One Column to Multiple Columns in Pandas
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to split one column in which contents are concatenated with delimiter like comma to multiple columns. Or use regex expression to extract contents for multiple columns.

  • How to use str.split() to split one column to multiple columns
  • How to use str.extract() to extract contents ofr multiple columns

item.title: How to Select Rows Containing Specified String
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to extract rows containing specified string or satisfying some conditions.

  • How to select rows from DataFrame
  • Select rows with specified column has exactly the same value
  • Select rows with specified column values partially same with the specified conditions

item.title: How to Use Map() Apply() ApplyMap() Methods in Pandas
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to use map(), apply() and applymap() and when to use one over the other. These methods can apply certain processing over DataFrame Columns and update values or create new columns.

  • Usage scope of three methods
  • How to use map()
  • How to use apply()
  • How to use applymap()

item.title: How to Process Null Values in Pandas
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about how to process null/empty data in DataFrame. In real world, it’s impossible to have values in every row and column of the data. So when we encounter a data set containing null values, we have to decide whether to delete, replace, etc. to handle it according to our needs.

  • Delete rows or columns containing null values (dropna())
  • Replace null values with specified values (fillna())
  • Select rows or columns containing null values

item.title: Lets Create a Programming Environment
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about topics below.

  • What is programming environment
  • What is needed to build a programming enviroment
  • So let’s get started
  • Say hello to the world
  • Conclusion

Source:dribbble by Syed Zaquan

item.title: What Is Programming? Can I Learn It? How to Learn It?
item.description:
In this article, we will talk about topics below.

  • What is programming
  • What can programming do
  • Can I learn it
  • How to learn it

item.description: In this article, we will talk about how to filter data in DataFrame. In other words, how to select rows from a DataFrame based on column values?

Pandas >> How to Sort in Pandas
item.description: In this article, we will talk about how to sort data in DataFrame.

item.title: Pandas >> How to Select and Modify Data
item.description: In this article, we will talk about how to select data at any position of DataFrame and modify it.

item.title: Pandas >> usage of agg(), aggregate()
item.description: In this article, we will talk about the usage of agg and aggregate in Pandas.

item.title: Apache Spark >> SparkSession, Create DataFrame
item.description:
Apache Spark, written in Scala, is a general-purpose distributed computing and data processing engine. Apache Spark supports Scala, Java, Python, SQL and R language.

In this series, we will use Python as main language.

item.title: Playwright >> Basic Usage
item.description:
Playwright is a Node.js library to automate Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API. Playwright is built to enable cross-browser web automation that is ever-green, capable, reliable and fast.

In this article, we will go through basic usage of Playwright.

item.title: Openpyxl >> How to Work With Excel Files in Python
item.description:
A Python library to read/write Excel xlsx/xlsm/xltx/xltm files.

In this article, we will talk about how to read/write Excel files in openpyxl library including how to load an Excel file to workbook, get a worksheet from workbook, change worksheet name, insert a new worksheet, copy a worksheet, and save workbook into an Excel file.

item.title: Pandas >> How to Read various data in Pandas
item.description: In this article, we will discuss how to read various type of data in Pandas including pickle, clipboard, excel, json, HTML, XML, parquet files.

item.title: Pandas >> How to Read CSV file in Pandas
item.description: In this article, we will talk about various ways of reading csv files in Pandas.

item.title: Pandas >> How to Create DataFrame in Pandas
item.description: In this article, we will talk about different ways of creating DataFrame in Pandas.
